aka: Howard Zinn, A People's History Of the United States
this_title: Howard Zinn: a People's History of the U.s
trans_title: Howard Zinn, A People's History Of the United States
introduction: With the tremendous success of his book, A People's History of the United States, Howard Zinn radically changed the way Americans see themselves. His friend Noam Chomsky says that Zinn litteraly transformed a generation's conscience. Zinn talks about those who have no voice in the official History : Slaves, Indians, deserters, textile workers, union men. On two occasions in Par...
